page.title: 17PRIORY BAPTIST CHURCH, 1.
page.content: In{1947}some Christians from Cottingham Road and this area held a service in Priory Primary School. In {1956}a wooden church was built on {Coronation Road.}The land for this building was leased for 10 years. In 1965 the church had 10 members. In 1975 the church had to move because of redevelopment and the new church opened in{1976,}it cost Â£44.000. The land had previously held prefabricated houses. The church holds 150 people. There is a large hall,a small meeting room, a classroom, two vestries, an office, a toilet and a storeroom. There are about 57 members of the church, the oldest is 90 and the youngest 16 and the Sunday School has about 70 members. The church also a variety of groups during the week.
